summary: Completed comprehensive testing of fake news detection app. Backend API mostly functional (83.3% success) but critical LLM text analysis fails. Frontend loads correctly with proper branding and UI components, but share functionality causes runtime errors that block user interactions.

critical_bugs.issue: LLM analysis returns invalid JSON causing 520 error - 'Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)'
critical_bugs.impact: Text analysis completely broken - core feature unusable

working_endpoints.status: ✅ Working - Successfully analyzes URLs (BBC News scored 95/100)
✅ Working - Returns specific analysis by ID

critical_bugs.issue: Clipboard writeText permission denied causes uncaught runtime error
critical_bugs.impact: Error overlay blocks all UI interactions, preventing navigation and further testing
critical_bugs.error_details: NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied

working_features.status: ✅ Working - Veritas AI title and tagline display correctly
✅ Working - 50+ character requirement enforced, button states correct
✅ Working - Tab switching and URL input functional
✅ Working - Successfully analyzes URLs and navigates to results
✅ Working - Credibility meter, breakdown cards, and data display correctly
✅ Working - Proper fonts (Playfair Display + IBM Plex Sans), spacing, and layout

blocked_features.issue: Error overlay prevents clicking back/history buttons
blocked_features.status: ❌ Cannot test due to share error blocking UI

blocked_features.issue: Cannot navigate due to error overlay
blocked_features.status: ❌ Cannot test due to share error blocking UI

blocked_features.issue: Backend LLM failure + frontend error overlay

passed_tests: Backend URL analysis with web scraping
Frontend text input validation and character counting
Frontend analysis results display with credibility meter

success_percentage.backend: 83.3% (5/6 tests passed - URL analysis works, text analysis fails)
success_percentage.frontend: 60% (core UI works, share functionality breaks interactions)

critical_fixes: Fix LLM JSON parsing in analyze_with_llm() function - LLM response is not valid JSON
Fix share functionality clipboard permissions - add try/catch error handling
Test text analysis flow after LLM fix
investigation_needed: Check Emergent LLM API response format - may need response parsing adjustment
Verify GPT-4o model is returning JSON in expected format
Consider fallback clipboard method for share functionality
